Игра очень затягивает каждый уровень по своему интересен и загадочен.
+Слоу мо + OVER 9000 к эпичности.
+Разновидности монстров очень порадовало они по своему сложны даже на лёгком уровне сложности.
+Атмасфера просто на 5+ некоторые карты порожают своей красотой, игра была создан в 2009 году но графика по своему хороша.
+Большой выбор оружия на каждый класс
+Классы со своими ачивками и навыками

It's a great game with:
- Much gore.
- Slow motion time (Zed Time).
- A great Sountrack (Metal / Rock soundtrack).
- A great variety of weapons.
- A great variety of enemies.
- The game has a slight cinematic touch (that I loved).

In my opinion this is a great game, with the requirements you can run it in an old pc, highly recommended for those players looking for this type of PC games.

Survival horror posiadający solo i tryb kooperacji, ktory oczywiście polecam!
Gra słada się z 10 fal, ostatnia najtrudniejsza - boss |Patriarcha| Uzbrojony w wyrzutne rakiet oraz minigun. W każdej rozgrywce moze uczestniczyć DO 6 graczy, ktorzy przed rozpoczęciem wybierają odpowiednia dla nich klase postaci. Po kazdej fali pokazuję sie droga do handlarza, gdzie mozemy nabyć odpowiednie wyposażenie za zdobyte pieniądzę. 
Jeszcze więcej innych plusów:
* slow motion
* dostepny szeroki wybór postaci oraz broni
* mozliwosc kupna DLC
* spawanie drzwi
* czat głosowy
* ciekawa muzyka
* różne typy potworów próbujących jeść Ci twarz :3

Killing Floor is kind of like Left 4 Dead, but more emphasis on the survival aspect. Instead of trying to progress through a level, you and up to 5 other friends (or strangers) are thrust into a map that is literally just a death arena sprinkled with eye candy. Your goal is to survive a certain amount of rounds, depending on the length you set the game on. The difficulty ranges from fighting mutated grannies to fighting immortal killing machines that will stop at nothing to feast on your juicy organs. 6 classes with different strengths and bonuses provide some gameplay variation.  Each class gets special buffs to help his team. After you defeat all the zeds, you fight the Patriarch, an ugly, ruthless boss hell-bent on destroying your squad. While he can be simple on easy difficulties, it's like finding a piece of straw in a needle stack on harder difficulties.

This game has cons as it does pros, so here's a list.

PROS:
Nice variation of characters/weapons/enemies
Decent graphics for its age
Nice maps
Workshop support
Holiday updates that allow you to snag elusive weapons, such as the Zed Eradication Device
Holiday updates also allow you to get special characters like The Reaper
Satisfying weapons
Satisfying gore
VERY satisfying slow-mo "ZED Time"
Music that makes you feel like Master Chief (or any other cool person)
Good amount of comedy, for the game genre
------------
CONS:
DLCs are WAY TOO EXPENSIVE
Final boss has no real variations, just the same boss every time
Enemy AI can get glitchy
Some annoying bugs like getting stuck in the ground on some multiplayer games
Interface can be confusing for new players

Overall, I highly recommend this game, especially if you have friends to play it with. While it can be frustrating, the game is very well made and provides fun for everyone.
But try to get the DLC on sale, unless you like having to get bank loans to play as a terminator-chicken.

Fun zombie killing action with british accents. Similar to a mix of left for dead and horde mode, with you buying weapons with money earned from killing zombies, including special zombies, and with the game ending in a boss fight. No campaign but there are special missions with a story and the world has an overarching story, but it mostly stays in the background and description of maps. Very excited for the sequal.

Оооочень интересная.После покупки показалась скучной.В виду скоропоспежных заявлений.Но однажды попробовав сыграть в сетевую игру.С командой лиц.Сразу затянуло по уши..Как писалось где-то в отзывах, о музыке - это даааа. нечто...Heavy metal...Здесь правит только командная игра, жажда наживы(так как, за убитых зомби дают кэш)....Который непременно тратим в ближайшем @Shop Gun@. На всякие вкусняшки.+ если есть лишка можно подкинуть кэш напарнику по ружью:).Много классов персонажей(медик, подрывник, берсерк, техник, командос, пиро,снайпер и т.д), которые обладают своими определенными навыками и арсеналом(все оружие доступно всем классам.)Есть прокачка класса..Тобишь скидка на оружие, меньше урон от бомб и т.д и т.п. По достижению определенных условий (для снайпера: завалить 2500 тысяч зомбов в хэд из различных видов оружия).Ладно о классах.Масса карт от тунеля любви до ада. На хэлоуин деревенские зомби с Турбо Широфом со змеей в груди с вертолетной пушкой и базукой вместо одной руки. Вобщем если любите тематику зомби и мяса... Тогда в эту игру стоит поиграть 100%.....Темболее на сервах народа тьма....И еще 2015 году выйдет вторая чать Killing Floor 2 еще круче графа и больше экшена!!!Моя оценка 10/10

С первых минут игры в Killing Floor кажется что тебя дико наебaли продав Пре Альфа версию под видом полноценной игры, на самом же деле все намного хуже чем есть. Разработчики xyй клали на элементарные баг фиксы и обновления игры, они слишком заняты введением убогого доната и разработкой второй части игры (я уверен она будет такой же хуeвой). Кто то может сказать что добрые разрабы недавно выпустили бесплатное длс к игре, так вот с этим длс вам придется ниxyевo пошаманить что бы оно разаботало, легче выучить арабский чем заставить это гoвно работать.

This game is amazing on many levels going from creepy level design to scary enemies and great weapon design. First off lets take a look at the class system: *At the start or midway of a round/game you can chose a class wich makes you better at certain things like fire damage or damage resistance, choosing a class will benefit certain playstyles like a berserker with melee. Also to level up specific classes you must do specific things like deal x amount of fire damage or heal x health. Leveling up a class will boost the stuff it already gives you and most likely give it a new passive ability to add to your selection.* Now lets go into enemy design: *Every enemy has its own behavior and stradegy like jumping at you or attacking in group. The Clot is a basic enemy who attacks anyone it can mostly found in groups while the Stalker mostly tries to sneak in on you and the Crawler uses high points to assault from the air. Overall most if not all enemeis have great creepy design and awesome attack methods.* Now lets go over level and weapon design: *I find many of the weapons to be very interresting going from swords and knifes to grenade launchers and rocket launcers. Every class has specific weapons they are good with and all weapons recomended for a specific class will have said class emblem on it. There is not much i can say about the weapons so lets go to the level design. The levels in Killing Floor are great at making good atmosphere for the game by making creepy sounds, looking creepy or overall having creepy music. Some levels are even more scary to play than the enemies in it.* Now the final aspect i will cover is characters: *Characters are not anything else than skins but still thay are amazing. You can choose skins that you think suits your style like having a metal plated man being berserker or gasmask weilding people with fire weapons.* Now i shall go over the stuff i dont like so lets begin with some core basics like moment: 'The movement speed is pretty slow (wich im okay with but it my slow down the action and stuff) and the jump seem pretty useless mostly.' Also the difficulty: 'It has its thing with being very noob friendly on the easiest but no pro no go at anything higher than that, the huge leap of difficulty from the first to the next is to high.' Other than that i cant think of much more other than tat i find it hard to play with friends (due to my inabillity to understand how to do much technical stuff on pc) so ill say this game is a 4-4,5/5 GOOD GAME RECOMMENDED
